docs.text: Welcome the CoderDojo Twin Cities Robot Media Repo This repo contains media resources for Raspberry Pi Pico robots including images to display on the OLED displays and sound files for playing when the robots want to signal mode changes or movement events. Project layout 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 midi-files # Midi sound files mp3-files # MP3 files that will need conversion to play on the pico wav-8k # WAV files in 8K Hz 16-bit format that can be played directly on the Rapsberry Pi Pico using the wave libraries wav-files # General wav files in many formats mkdocs.yml # The mkdocs configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage.
